title: Which language the phone support?How do I change the system language?
answer:
Y541-U02 support 中文（简体）、中文（台湾繁体）、中文（香港繁体）、English ,45 languages etc. 

 On the home screen, go to Settings. On the All screen, touch Language & input. Under System language, touch Language and select a language. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111440)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111441)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111442)
